conditions.name: Asleep
conditions.effect: You take a –10 penalty to Perception checks to notice things.

conditions.name: Bleeding
conditions.effect: You take the listed damage at the beginning of your turn.

conditions.name: Blinded
conditions.effect: You’re flat-footed, you take a –4 penalty to most Str- and Dex-based skill checks and opposed Perception checks, you automatically fail Perception checks based on sight, opponents have total concealment against you, and you must succeed at a DC 10 Acrobatics check to move faster than half speed or else fall prone.

conditions.name: Broken (item only)
conditions.effect: Weapon: attack and damage rolls take a –2 penalty and can’t deal extra effects on a critical hit; armor: AC bonuses are halved and the armor check penalty is doubled; vehicle: –2 penalty to AC, collision DC, and Piloting modifier, and it halves its full speed and MPH; tool or tech that provides bonuses: bonuses are halved.

conditions.name: Burning
conditions.effect: You take the listed fire damage each round, and you must be extinguished to end the condition.

conditions.name: Confused
conditions.effect: You treat all creatures as enemies, and you must roll on the table to determine your actions.

conditions.name: Cowering
conditions.effect: You’re flat-footed and can take no actions.

conditions.name: Dazed
conditions.effect: You can take no actions.

conditions.name: Dazzled
conditions.effect: You take a –1 penalty to attack rolls and sight-based Perception checks.

conditions.name: Dead
conditions.effect: Your soul leaves your body, you can’t act in any way, and you can’t benefit from normal or magical healing.

conditions.name: Deafened
conditions.effect: You take a –4 penalty to initiative checks and opposed Perception checks, and you automatically fail sound-based Perception checks.

conditions.name: Dying
conditions.effect: You’re unconscious, you can take no actions, and you must stabilize or lose Resolve Points and potentially die.

conditions.name: Encumbered
conditions.effect: Speeds are reduced by 10 feet, maximum Dex bonus to AC is reduced to +2, and you take a –5 penalty to Str- and Dex-based checks.

conditions.name: Entangled
conditions.effect: You move at half speed; you cannot run or charge; and you take a –2 penalty to AC, attack rolls, Reflex saves, initiative checks, and Dex-based skill and ability checks.

conditions.name: Exhausted
conditions.effect: You move at half speed; you cannot run or charge; you take a –3 penalty to AC, attack rolls, melee damage rolls, Reflex saves, initiative checks, and Str- and Dex-based skill and ability checks; and you reduce your encumbered limit by 3 bulk.

conditions.name: Fascinated
conditions.effect: You must pay attention to the fascinating effect and take a –4 penalty to skill checks made as reactions.

conditions.name: Fatigued
conditions.effect: You cannot run or charge; you take a –1 penalty to AC, attack rolls, melee damage rolls, Reflex saves, initiative checks, and Str- and Dex-based skill and ability checks; and you reduce your encumbered limit by 1 bulk.

conditions.name: Flat-footed
conditions.effect: You take a –2 penalty to AC, and you cannot take reactions or make attacks of opportunity.

conditions.name: Frightened
conditions.effect: You must flee or fight, and you take a –2 penalty to ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

conditions.name: Grappled
conditions.effect: You cannot move or take two-handed actions; you take a –2 penalty to AC, most attack rolls, Reflex saves, initiative checks, and Dex-based skill and ability checks; and you cannot make attacks of opportunity.

conditions.name: Helpless
conditions.effect: Your Dex modifier is –5, and melee attacks against you gain a +4 bonus.

conditions.name: Nauseated
conditions.effect: You’re unable to attack, cast spells, or concentrate on spells, and the only action you can take is a single move action per turn.

conditions.name: Off-kilter
conditions.effect: You can’t take move actions except to right yourself, you take a –2 penalty to attacks, and you’re flat-footed.

conditions.name: Off-Target
conditions.effect: You take a –2 penalty to attack rolls.

conditions.name: Overburdened
conditions.effect: Speeds are reduced to 5 feet; maximum Dex bonus to AC is reduced to +0; and you take a –5 penalty to Str- and Dex-based checks.

conditions.name: Panicked
conditions.effect: You drop all held items; you flee at top speed; you cannot take other actions; you take a –2 penalty to ability checks, saving throws, and skill checks; and you cower if cornered.

conditions.name: Paralyzed
conditions.effect: Your Dex modifier is –5, and you cannot move but can take mental actions.

conditions.name: Pinned
conditions.effect: You cannot move, you’re flat-footed, and you take penalties to the same attributes as for grappled but the penalty is –4.

conditions.name: Prone
conditions.effect: You take a –4 penalty to melee attacks, a +4 bonus to AC against ranged attacks, and a –4 penalty to AC against melee attacks.

conditions.name: Shaken
conditions.effect: You take a –2 penalty to ability checks, attack rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

conditions.name: Sickened
conditions.effect: You take a –2 penalty to ability checks, attack rolls, weapon damage rolls, saving throws, and skill checks.

conditions.name: Stable
conditions.effect: You’re no longer dying, but you are still unconscious.

conditions.name: Staggered
conditions.effect: You can take only a single move or standard action each round and can’t take reactions, but you can take swift actions as normal.

conditions.name: Stunned
conditions.effect: You drop everything held, you can’t take actions, and you’re flat-footed.

conditions.name: Unconscious
conditions.effect: You’re knocked out and helpless.
